DOC.detailed_description: Minimizing radiation exposure patient operator consider one primary safety concern catheterization laboratory . Patients undergoing diagnostic angiography +/- ad hoc PCI plan PCI , randomise conventional setting ( 15 FPS 15 PPS ) low frame rate setting ( 7.5 FPS 15 PPS ) low Cine setting ( 7.5 FPS 10 PPS ) . The patient radiation dose , patient radiation dose area product ( DAP ) , fluoroscopy time measure . Statistical Analysis : Demographic procedural variable present percentage ( categorical variable ) mean Â± SD ( continuous variable ) . Patients randomize three arm - control arm two intervention arm . The angiographic radiation protocol adhere standard practice fluoroscopy cine image 15 frames/second . The intervention arm consist two group . Group 1 fluoroscopy image set 7.5 frames/second cine image set 15 frames/second group 2 fluoroscopy set 7.5 frames/second cine set 10 frames/second . Sample size calculation base assume reduction radiation dose group 1 10 % group 2 20 % . At 5 % significance 80 % power , sample size 200 patient require intervention arm . Allowing 10 % attrition rate , sample size 220 patient require intervention arm 100 patient control arm .
